message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on statistics for help. A t-test is used to compare the means of two groups, which is the case in this scenario with the female cross country runners and sedentary females. Linear regression is used to investigate the relationship between two variables, Chi-square test is used to analyze categorical data, and F-test is used to compare the variance of two groups.
